Our Challange Is :

Our Food is Hotter then Your Ex & Better then your Next!

Read our story

we've been making delicious food since We Open

As for our restaurant, we make everything fresh – onsite. To make the dips; we wash, peel, and blend – all in-house. Same with our kebabs and yemeks.

What has not changed, however, is our insistence that everything be done the old-fashioned way. Our bakery, for instance, can be best described as a village bakery (complete with wood-fired ovens) within a contemporary, industrial setting.!
